description:
**Fix Overview**:

Implementing updates through Intune for Teams can significantly enhance bandwidth efficiency by reducing WAN traffic across customers. This shift towards modern Teams operates alongside necessary preparations for integration with Citrix AVD and FSLogix.

1. Utilize Intune to manage Teams updates effectively.
2. Assess your Citrix AVD and FSLogix configurations to ensure preparedness for the transition to modern Teams.
3. Keep abreast of any release notes or updates regarding FSLogix, as they may impact functionality.

**Details**:
This method leverages current infrastructure to optimize updates but requires ample preparation for components that are not yet fully compatible. Verify that all dependencies are handled prior to rolling out changes. (LLM Synthesized)
